gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUI()
      Constructor for the GUI class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableFrame()
      Sets the contentPane to enabled and the background to lightGray.

      Calls the setEnabled method on the address boxes with the given boolean.

      Quit the application

      Calls the controller to retrieve the map and the slider.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        public GUI()
        Constructor for the GUI class. First it makes the frame and then the menu bar. Then the right panel is made and inserted into the frame. The frame is then set up and a pointer to the controller is created.

    • Method Detail

      • setupMap

        public void setupMap()
        Calls the controller to retrieve the map and the slider. Add a mouse wheel listener to the map and get the zoom level to the slider. Then remove the loadingPanel, setup the slider and map, and then enable the contentPane at last.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(java.lang.String text)
        Set the text of the JLabel statusbar

        text -

      • quit

        public void quit()
        Quit the application

      • enableFrame

        public void enableFrame()
        Sets the contentPane to enabled and the background to lightGray.

      • enableSearch

        public void enableSearch(boolean bool)
        Calls the setEnabled method on the address boxes with the given boolean.
        Parameters:
        bool -
